sentences.sContent: They lived in an unhealthily claustrophobic atmosphere.
sentences.sCn: 他们住在一个病态的、能导致幽闭恐惧症的环境中。
这个房子感觉太封闭了。

trans.tranCn: 幽闭恐怖症的， 导致幽闭恐怖症的
trans.tranOther: You describe a place or situation as claustrophobic when it makes you feel uncomfortable and unhappy because you are enclosed or restricted
